item.title: Streaming machine learning
item.description: MathJax.Hub.Config({ extensions: ["tex2jax.js","TeX/AMSmath.js","TeX/AMSsymbols.js"], jax: ["input/TeX", "output/HTML-CSS"], tex2jax: { inlineMath: [ ['$','$'], ["\\(","\\)"] ], displayMath: [ ['$$','$$'], ["\\[","\\]"] ], }, "HTML-CSS": { availableFonts: ["TeX"] } }); Streaming machine learning Batch learning: In batch machine learning, we use one dataset to train a model, and we deploy the model to predict on new data. This assumes that the dataset in which the model is trained is a proper representative sample of the population.
